Quotes.quote: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.
Quotes.author: Paul Cézanne

Quotes.quote: A man is great by deeds, not by birth.
Quotes.author: Chanakya

Quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
Quotes.author: George Sand

Quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

Quotes.quote: Don't ruin the present with the ruined past.
Quotes.author: Ellen Gilchrist

Quotes.quote: The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison with it, that was the miracle.
Quotes.author: Anaïs Nin
